title: How can I add certificates for websites to the ELB using AWS Certificate Manager?
description:
Find more details in the AWS Knowledge Center: https://amzn.to/2x5Wvi3
Rahul, an AWS Cloud Support Engineer, shows you how to add multiple certificates for multiple websites to the ELB using Amazon Certificate Manager.

title: How does ACM managed renewal work with certificates that have wildcards and sub-domains?
description:
Find more details in the AWS Knowledge Center: https://amzn.to/2FLv3dU
Rohan, an AWS Cloud Support Engineer,  shows you how AWS Certificate Manager (ACM) managed renewal works with certificates that have wildcards and sub-domains.

title: AWS re:Inforce 2019: Root CA Hierarchies for AWS Certificate Manager (ACM) Private CA (FND320)
description: AWS recently announced root certificate authority (CA) hierarchies for AWS Certificate Manager (ACM) Private CA. CA administrators can now quickly and easily create a complete CA hierarchy, including root and subordinate CAs, with no need for external CAs. In this presentation, we provide an overview of ACM Private CA and discuss some common use cases, such as issuing private certificates in order to identify devices. You learn how to create a two-level CA hierarchy and use it to issue private certificates. You also learn security best practices for creating and managing a CA hierarchy, and you have a chance to ask questions.

tags: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority
title: AWS Summit San Francisco 2018 - AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority
description: Introducing AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority, a managed private CA service to securely manage the lifecycle of your private certificates. Learn more at - https://amzn.to/2EqbPI6

title: AWS Private Certificate Authority
description:
Learn more at - https://amzn.to/2EDIydb.
AWS Certificate Manager (ACM) Private Certificate Authority (CA) is a managed private CA service that helps you easily and securely manage the lifecycle of your private certificates. ACM Private CA allows you to create and renew private certificates for your internal resources such as, on-premises servers, AWS resources, IoT and mobile devices.
